column2:
$WHERE$ gets §Y$WHAT$§! until §Y$DATE$§!, giving the following effects:
$EFFECT$
This modifier is there to let you know orc raids are occuring somewhere in your realm.
Our country enforces policies that prevent minorities from constructing permanent buildings, even on land they own.
Old man Dryzymala avoids the building ban by living in a wagon
Our school system discriminates against citizens who are not of our national culture.
An underground organisation provides higher education in a minority language
Justifying wars can be done faster
The World Bank, tag FOR, needs to be at the bottom of the list in terms of points. Otherwise, everyone below them is absolutely screwed.

Recently we have recruited leaders from out nobility and outstanding officers. In order to allow the recruitment pool to swell in ranks again to a sizeable level, we ought to wait before recruiting any more generals.

Recently we have recruited leaders from out nobility and outstanding officers. In order to allow the recruitment pool to swell in ranks again to a sizeable level, we ought to wait before recruiting any more admirals.
The number of soldiers joining the realm's armed forces has waned in recent years. §RThis modifier lets you know that you have a country flag that limits soldier pops to 3% until it is removed§!
We are in possession of the One Ring. §RThis powerful artefact makes our pops more evil, and gives all other realms free cbs on us.§!
We have sent a hunting party searching for the rumored One Ring near Hobbiton.
A member of our realm is part of the Fellowship of the Ring!

Our member of the Fellowship of the Ring sacrified themselves in the Mines of Moria to save the Fellowship from certain doom. They single-handedly fought an unbeatable foe - a Balrog of Morgoth - to buy time for the rest to escape. §RThis modifier makes you pops slightly more good-aligned§!.
This prevents us from Utility Tag peacing out.
When this modifier disappears, the War of the Ring starts!
War of the Ring End Countdown
When this modifier disappears, the War of the Ring will end!
Our ruler has a kind personaility.
Our ruler was born into a noble house.
Our ruler is stubborn and usually gets his way.
Our ruler tends to side with the nobles over the people.
Our ruler tends to side with the people over the nobles.
Our ruler is not wise and many consider him a joke.
Our ruler is wise and is taken seriously.
Our ruler is so lazy that they are unwilling to partake in a game of golf.
Our ruler is diligent in their duties.
Our ruler is greedy and always looking for more ways to make money.
Our ruler is generous and likes to freely give away belongings to the people.
Getting rich is more important than the rule of law to our ruler.
The rule of law is more important than money to our ruler.

The Blue Wizard Pallando is at our court providing us with a myriad of benefits
The Lesser Rings were the series of rings created by Celebrimbor and Sauron as essays in the craft, before they created the Rings of Power. This Lesser Ring provides some meagre benefits.

At the behest of Steward Ecthelion II, the Gondorian military has begun encouraging outsiders to join the military.
The warrior and advisor, Thorongil, is a personal retainer of the Steward. His counsel stengthens the military
With the Orc raids occurring in Ithilien, many of the people have taken up arms. We have supplied them, turning them into a true fighting force.
The Crossroads of the Fallen King

The current tree in the Court of the Fountain is the Third White Tree of Gondor. This tree was planted in T.A. 1640, and died in T.A. 2872 with the death of Ruling Steward Belector II. The thought and sight of the Dead Tree bring despair into the hearts of all true Gondorians, and with no known sapling, that despair will last for an eternity.
Migrants §Y$VAL$§!% more likely to choose region.
§GWe have attempted to puppet Drúwaith Iaur§!
§GWe have reestablished a presence in South Gondor§!
